compensationPlans.name: Basic Commission Plan
compensationPlans.description: Standard 5% commission on all closed sales. Ideal for new sales representatives building their pipeline.

compensationPlans.name: Tiered Commission Plan
compensationPlans.description: Progressive commission rates that increase as sales volume grows. Rewards consistent high performers.

compensationPlans.name: Accelerator Plan
compensationPlans.description: Base commission plus accelerated earnings when exceeding quota. Designed for enterprise account executives.

compensationPlans.name: Team-Based Plan
compensationPlans.description: Individual commission plus team pool bonus. Encourages collaboration while rewarding personal achievement.

compensationPlans.name: Executive Compensation Plan
compensationPlans.description: Comprehensive package including base salary, equity participation, and performance-based bonuses.
